name: Lost Signal (ret724)
description:
Lost Signal is a game where you play as a robot plugged into a router and your goal is to get the router onto the green buttons and exit the through the door, but the only way to move it is by standing on red buttons. if you go to far from the button you self destruct. also the stretched out blue buttons also make you explode

Main Menu Things:

The Wifi Icon is your cursor

The big L is to toggle Loading screens

A level goes blue after beaten

All Screenshots were taking on the Windows64 version of the game

Screenshots may not be accurate after a couple updates if I update it at all

To do:
